Ability: Imprisons infantry (by sending them into the Field Bureau) to allow them to be trained if they are otherwise unavailable for the player and returns 50% of their cost
Notes: Cannot reverse-engineer Tier 2 and Tier 3 Soviet infantry
Can be infiltrated to reset the captured infantry tech
infobox_data.Select sound: Mixed sound from theNod Outpost(Tiberium Wars) and theReactor(Red Alert 3)
